Class PolygonDyn

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polygon
      • PolygonDyn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class PolygonDyn
extends Polygon
    This is the PolygonDyn class. Extend from Polygon class. Uses Java Arrays to hold points.
    Author:
    Cihan.
